name: Education Website Design
description:
Best modern online educational home page template with a clean, contemporary and attention-grabbing design. This template design is driven by variant color and pattern. With this template pixel perfect images and neat sectioning to help you create a professional looking multipurpose website. It is a creative home page template which handles both images and texts smartly so that you can show your creative works and also explain it to the user.
